63.eng-name: Merits of the Helpers in Madinah (Ansaar)

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Usaid:That he heard the Prophet (ﷺ) saying, "The best of the Ansar, or the best of the Ansar families (homes) are Banu An-Najjar, Bani `Abdul Ash-hal, Banu Al-Harith and Banu Sai'da

chapter.eng-name: The superiority of the families of the Ansar
